topicSummary: Corticosteroids are synthetic analogues of the natural hormones that are produced by the adrenal cortex.

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Corticosteroids - topical (skin), nose, and eyes: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Strengths and formulations updated in Table 2. Topical corticosteroids listed by potency class.

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Information added regarding adverse effects associated with oral corticosteroids according to updates to the manufacturer's summary of product characteristics.

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: Information that any of the systemic adverse effects associated with oral corticosteroids could also occur with topical corticosteroids, has been added to this topic.

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in June 2015 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last version of this topic. There have been no major changes to the recommendations.
